title: WHY IS THIS HAPPENING AGAIN!

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: right this is happening AGAIN! every time i speak to support about it they just say it's a problem with my bank but it's not a problem with my bank at all it just seems like they are to lazy to try find what is actually going on here considering it let me buy rp on my room mates account to send to my own (with the same card and details i'm putting into my account) and i have purchased a lot of rp with this same card on this account before. i'm getting very annoyed that it keeps stopping me from buying rp when i want to get new skins or champions can someone please look into this properly or are yous just going to keep telling me it's a problem with my bank when it isn't?

replies.body:
This isn't a problem with you bank perse, it's an issue where the info being input wasn't correct a few times and the payment was declined. After this happens too many times, you are completely locked out of purchases to help prevent people from stealing your card and committing fraud by brute force methods. 

At this point, any additional attempts to make a purchase will delay the time period that you need to wait. The only way that is going to lift is by waiting a full 24 hours, and honestly, it might be best to simply wait longer (I'd say 48 hrs) to make sure that all the failed attempts have cleared out first. Your best bet for getting this fixed is to not try buying RP until 10/7/2017.

last time this happened it wouldn't let me buy rp on my account but would let me buy it on other accounts now it won't let me buy it on other accounts and i never once typed my info in wrong so i don't know why it's doing this again
